result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher Allen Finn was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher Allen Finn
Current: 625 East Conservancy Court, Green Bay, WI 54311 United States  (Effective: 11-08-2017)
Prior: 271 Desplaines Road, Depere, WI 54313 United States

Defendant Christopher Allen Finn in court.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called @ 11:23 a.m. State has filed an amended information electronically even though an information was never filed. Ct 1 amended to misd possession THC. Def will plead to ct 1, ct 2 dri, $100 plus costs. Def agrees. Court reviews attorney waiver w/Def. Finds waiver knowing and voluntary and Def competent to represent himself in this matter. Def has received copy of amended information, Court reviews. Plea to ct 1 - guilty. Court grants motion to dri ct 2. Constitutional rights, elements, possible penalties reviewed. Court finds Def understands and plea freely made. Factual basis. Court accepts plea and finds guilty of ct 1. Sentencing remarks by the State. Nothing by Defendant. Remarks by the Court. Will follow agreement. $100 plus costs, DNA sample and surcharge, apply bond, return balance. Postconviction rights. (Verified w/Judge, return balance of bond to poster)

Defendant Christopher Allen Finn in court.  Jill Louise Laufenberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin and intern Courtney Imig.   Court reviews court record.  Def has received an offer from DA and wishes to accept this.   Def given right to an atty form and plea questionnaire form  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 8, 2017 at 11:15 am.

Defendant Christopher Allen Finn in court.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews court record.   Def contact an attorney however could not pay retainer fee.  Def indicates that he wants to contact attorney's in this area.  Statement by Atty Constable.  Bond will continue  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 6, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Court calls  @  3:12 pm.  Defendant Christopher Allen Finn in court.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Def. has meeting with lawyer on Wednesday.  If retains lawyer and can't make next court, Atty can contact JA.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 11, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Christopher Allen Finn in court.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews court record.  Def previously had public defender.  Court questions if def contacted counsel.  Court will consider releasing some bond money towards atty retainer.   Court will consider releasing $1000.00.   Bond will continue  Hearing scheduled for August 28, 2017 at 01:30 pm.
Appearance Bail Bond Agreement
Vertified with jail - Warrant canceld (B.M.)

Defendant Christopher Allen Finn not in court.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Notice of hearing was sent to def.  State requesting warrant, $1000. or body, state wide.  State requesting $500. cash bond be forfeited.   Court will authorize warrant $1000.00 or body, state wide.  Bond forfeited pending hearing
Judicial Pretrial - in court on August 14, 2017 at 03:15 pm.
Status conference on August 14, 2017 at 03:30 pm.
Notice of Hearing - Returned
Status conference on June 19, 2017 at 03:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher Allen Finn
Current: 271 Desplaines Road, Depere, WI 54313 United States  (Effective: 05-22-2017)
Prior: 534A High Avenue, Apt 2, Oshkosh, WI 54911

Defendant Christopher Allen Finn in court.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Def has not applied for public defender.  Notices have been sent to def however returned, moved no address.  State is requesting modification of bond.  State is requesting $1000. cash bond.  Court instructs def to contact his father to obtain an address.  Recess 4:10 pm.  Reconvene at 4:16 pm.  Def updates his address on record.   Court will not modify bond.  Court reviews right to counsel.  Def is working full time, court feels he will not be eligible for public defender or court appointed.  Court will adjourn 1 more time, if no counsel, court will feel def will be representing him self.  Bond will continue  Status conference scheduled for June 19, 2017 at 03:30 pm.
Status conference on May 22, 2017 at 03:30 pm.
Status conference on May 15, 2017 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Christopher Allen Finn in court.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews court record.  Statement by Atty Constable.  Statement by def.  Def gives address on record.  Def advised to contact the public defender, hire an atty or court appointed atty.  Def posted bond in Brown county.  Status conference scheduled for May 8, 2017 at 03:30 pm.
Bond posted Brown County
